#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int abs(int l)
{
    return (l>=0?l:-l);   
}
int main()
{
    int n1,n2;
    cin>>n1;
   while(n1)
   {
            cin>>n2;
            
            int arr[100000],arr1[10000]={0},i=0,k,l,z,count=0;
            cin>>arr[i];
            i++;
            arr1[arr[0]]=1;
            count++;
            for(k=1;k<n2;k++)
            {
                             int x;
                             cin>>x;
                             z=i;
                             for(l=0;l<z;l++)
                             {
                                             if(!arr1[abs(x-arr[l])])
                                             {
                                             arr[i++]=abs(x-arr[l]);
                                             arr1[abs(x-arr[l])]=1;
                                             if(abs(x-arr[l]))
                                             count++;
                                             }
                                             if(!arr1[x+arr[l]])
                                             {
                                             arr[i++]=x+arr[l];
                                             arr1[x+arr[l]]=1;
                                             count++;
                                             }
                             }
                             if(!arr1[x])
                             {
                             arr[i++]=x;
                             arr1[x]=1;
                             count++;
                             }
            }
                                    cout<<n1<<" "<<count<<"\n";
                                    
            cin>>n1;
}
            return 0;
}
